long_description: This Baby Jogger Child Tray fits single Baby Jogger strollers, providing your child with a durable, easy-to-clean surface for snacks or toys. Attaches easily to your Baby Jogger single-passenger stroller (sold separately). Cup holder secures a beverage for their on-the-go hydrating pleasure.
short_description: This Baby Jogger Child Tray fits single Baby Jogger strollers, providing your child with a durable, easy-to-clean surface for snacks or toys.
